channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [updated] API Connect (apiconnect) has changed the description of the plan named reserved-instance-fixed
item.description:
*before*: This plan is only available for customers who have already purchased API Connect Reserved from IBM or an authorized business partner. Contact your sales representative for more information.
IBM Cloud subscription credits can not be applied to purchase API Connect Reserved.
Provides a single-tenant deployment of API Connect with optional multi-zone region high availability option available. Leverage IBM Cloud services for common tasks like identity management, monitoring, auditing, and logging. Includes the management, gateway, analytics, and developer portal components, as well as tools for registering existing self-managed gateways located on-premises and on third-party clouds., *after*: This plan is only available for customers who have already purchased API Connect Reserved from IBM or an authorized business partner. Contact your sales representative for more information.
IBM Cloud subscription credits can not be applied to purchase API Connect Reserved.
Provides a single-tenant deployment of API Connect with optional multi-zone region high availability option available. Leverage IBM Cloud services for common tasks like identity management, monitoring, auditing, and logging. Includes the management, gateway, analytics, and developer portal components, as well as tools for registering existing self-managed gateways located on-premises and on third-party clouds.

item.title: [updated] Enterprise Application Service (enterprise-app-java) has changed the description of the plan named standard
item.description: *before*: A fully managed, single-tenant service designed to simplify your migration journey to the cloud. With access to automation tools, including watsonx code assistant generative AI, this service accelerates cloud migration, reduces complexity, and enables your development teams to innovate in a modern environment., *after*: .

item.title: [added] Fresche Security Suite (fresche-security-suite-v2)
item.description: Security, auditing, compliance, data encryption, and intrusion detection software solutions for IBM i systems.
